resources.string: Plants too have names and families! Test your knowledge
Do bilberry, Vaccinium myrtillus L., and common myrtle, Myrtus communis L., belong to the same family?
Which of these plants belong to the Asteraceae family?
Plantago media L., hoary plantain, belongs to the Plantaginaceae family. What is the name of its inflorescence?
What botanical family do Olea europaea L. (olive tree), Fraxinus excelsior L. (Europaean ash) and Fraxinus ornus L. (manna ash) belong to?
Rose belongs to the botanical family of Rosaceae. Which one or ones of the following belong to the same family?
Orange tree, Lemon tree, grapefruit tree and lime tree all belong to the same family (Rutaceae) and botanical genus. Which one?
Which botanical family does the genus Achillea L. (yarrow) belongs to?
Crocus sativus L. (Iridaceae) has been grown by men for thousands of years in order to obtain a very special spice. Which one?
Is purple loosestrife one of the common name of Lythrum salicaria L.(Lythraceae)?
Wild carrot ,Daucus carota L., belongs to the Apiaceae family. Which of the following plants belong to the same family?
